TopicTitle: How to get those badges or whatever on the bottom of your post?

Articles.Content: I know this isn't related to gameplay, but I just put it in here because it was the closest I could find to my topic. But anyways, how do you get those badges or pictures or some other things on the bottom of your posts?

It's a signature.

Click on your name on the top right of the site, click on "Account Settings", and set you signature.
how do you get an existing attachment though?

depends on what you are interested.

Challenge badge: look there , complete the challenge that award a completion badge and put it in the signature .

Other stuff (e.g. my KerbalX banner) varies accordingly to the service in question.
Moving to Kerbal Network, since this question is about the forum itself rather than how to play the game.
